short_description: This sorts the points in a LiDAR file by the GPS time.
help: This sorts the points in a LiDAR file by the GPS time. This can significantly help with LiDAR compression rates in the zLidar data format.

parameters.name: Input LiDAR Points
parameters.description: Name of the input LiDAR points.

parameters.name: Output LiDAR Points
parameters.description: Name of the output LiDAR points.
